quotes.quote: Your faith is your fortune.
Assume that you are what you want to be.
Imagination is the only reality.
What you believe, you can achieve.
Live your life in a state of gratitude.
Change your conception of yourself and you will automatically change the world in which you live.
Dare to believe in the reality of your assumption.
The world is a mirror, reflecting your conception of yourself.
All things are possible to him who believes.
You are the operant power.
Your imagination is the creative power within you.
Faith is the substance of things hoped for.
Everything happens automatically as you assume the feeling of your wish fulfilled.
Imagining creates reality.
To change your future, you must change your concept of yourself.
The feeling of the wish fulfilled is the key.
Men are all equally free, but they are not equally good.
Your assumptions create your reality.
It is your own wonderful human imagination that is the creator of your experience.
You cannot create what you do not believe.
Your assumptions dominate your behavior.
Everything you experience is a reflection of your consciousness.
Do not let your senses dictate what is real.
Imagination is the key to all manifestation.
You are today where your thoughts have brought you.
Be careful what you assume.
You must assume your wish is fulfilled.
Creation is finished.
The story of your life is determined by your assumption.
You can only be what you imagine yourself to be.
What you imagine is far more real than what you perceive.
To imagine is to create.
You are not the victim of your circumstances.
Feel the joy of the wish fulfilled.
Let your imagination soar to heights of ecstasy.
Your imagination is the greatest gift you possess.
Live in the end.
You must see and feel yourself already in possession of your desire.
Your imagination is a powerful tool.
Do not let doubt cripple your imagination.
The moment you accept your wish as an existing fact, you are in the state of fulfillment.
The world is a reflection of your thoughts.
Feel what you desire as if it were already yours.
Imagination creates the world.
Dare to assume the feeling of your wish fulfilled.
Assume you are what you desire to be.
The only limit to your manifestation is your own belief.
To think feelingly is to create.
You create your own reality.
The entire world is in your imagination.
All that we behold is full of blessings.
Everything you experience is a manifestation of your consciousness.
Your experience is a reflection of your beliefs.
Imagination and faith create your world.
What you persist in believing becomes your reality.
You must visualize and feel that you already have your desire.
Ask, believe, receive.
What you assume to be true will be true.
Feel your way into your future.
Your assumptions create your experience.
The mind is a powerful creator.
Everything is possible to him who believes.
Manifesting is a journey of feeling.
Feel the reality of your wish.
To change your life, change your assumptions.
Everything begins and ends in your imagination.
Assume the feeling of your wish fulfilled.
You are not shackled by your past.
Believe in your own power to create.
Creation is finished; it is a matter of awareness.
Your imagination can bring forth anything you desire.
Every assumption you make shapes your destiny.
You are the master of your fate.
Your consciousness creates the world.
The world is a projection of your beliefs.
Assumption is the key to your success.
You cannot be free until you understand your assumptions.
The power of creation lies within you.
The outer world reflects your inner state.
You become what you think about.
Everything is a manifestation of imagination.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
As you believe, so shall it be done unto you.
Imagination is the starting point for all creation.
Everything begins with an idea.
Your life is a reflection of your inner beliefs.
The future is created by what you imagine.
The key to change is belief.
Imagination is your strongest ally.
Assume the feeling of your wish fulfilled and it must come to pass.
The law of assumption is the secret to personal change.
To manifest is to believe it is already yours.
Your present condition is but the result of your past thinking.
The worldâ€™s condition is a reflection of your own beliefs.
Imagination is not just a tool, it is the creator.
Life is fundamentally a mental experience.
Your imagination can influence the world.
Believe that you can and you already have.
Imagination allows you to create from the invisible.
What you desire is already seeking you.
If you want it, you must believe it.
Your imagination is your greatest asset.
The only limits are those set by your own views.
To manifest your desires, you must feel them.
You must believe in the possibility of your dreams.
Everything happens as you imagine it to be.
Your feelings are the basis for everything in your life.
Imagination is the source of all creation.
What you believe shapes your future.
Creation is the ultimate expression of imagination.
Your subconscious is your source of power.
To change your mind is to change your life.
Everything is possible when you believe.
Your imagination is your tool for success.
Feelings are the secret to your success.
Your beliefs create your experience.
Believe in your capacity to create.
Imagination is the key to all transformation.
You are the creator of your destiny.
Imagination is the only limit to what you can achieve.
Your thoughts create your world.
To achieve your goals, you must believe in them.
Imagine the feeling of the wish fulfilled.
Faith is the bridge between your dreams and reality.
